<h1 class="has-pills">
  Annotation
  <span data-algolia-exclude><span class="pill pill--object pill--normal-case pill--large"><code>OBJECT</code></span></span>
</h1>
<!-- vale on -->


An annotation allows you to add arbitrary content to the top of a build page in the Buildkite UI
